Title: Hemorrhoidectomy by means of the high frequency current

Abstract: A METHOD for the remova of hemorrhoids which is by no means idea1 but is one that has given good resuIts over a period of severa years and in the hands of a Iarge number of men, is the appIication of the high frequency current. The probabiIity is that, with a growing acceptance of the vaIue of these currents when empIoyed surgicaIIy in other portions of the body and with a better understanding of the appIication of these currents, the method wiI1 come into more genera1 use. In the effort to Iearn of the experiences of men who have been using the high frequency current for the destruction ot hemorrhoids, a questionnaire was sent out to which twenty-five reIativeIy compIete repIies were received. This questionnaire with the summary of repIies received, is as foIIows:
